entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few rain showers or wet snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
